      • setTempDamageBuff

        public void setTempDamageBuff​(double buff)
        Set the temporary damage buff. This is a multiplicative factor which will modify the damage for the next attack made by this Character. After the next attack, it will get reset back to 1.0
        Parameters:
        buff - the multiplicative factor for the next attack's damage.
